fr.fgrabenstaetter.DigitalAssets Digital Assets Cryptocurrencies prices and statistics https://gitlab.gnome.org/fgrabenstaetter/digital-assets CC0-1.0 GPL-3.0+ fr.fgrabenstaetter.DigitalAssets.desktop François Grabenstaetter francoisgrabenstaetter@gmail.com fr.fgrabenstaetter.DigitalAssets
Digital Assets is a utility to follow cryptocurrencies prices and statistics which integrates well with the GNOME desktop.
Utility
https://gitlab.gnome.org/fgrabenstaetter/digital-assets/raw/master/screenshot.png
What's new in this release:
Some bug and style fixes
Support of 12-hour clock for day graphics
Remove the quit menu entry
​
